data.title: Binance Market Update (2025-02-04)
data.description:
The global cryptocurrency market cap now stands at $3.12T, down by -7.54% over the last day, according to CoinMarketCap data.

Bitcoin (BTC) has been trading between $94,131 and $102,500 over the past 24 hours. As of 09:30 AM (UTC) today, BTC is trading at $98,600, up by 2.87%.

Most major cryptocurrencies by market cap are trading mixed. Market outperformers include UTK, QTUM, and VTHO, up by 37%, 26%, and 18%, respectively.

Real-World Asset Tokenization Markets Reach New Heights

Ethereum Validators Support Gas Limit Increase

data.title: Crypto exchange XeggeX suffered a hacker attack, and users were unable to log in to their personal accounts
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to official news, the crypto exchange XeggeX issued a statement saying that its CEO account was hacked and the relevant TG account and XeggeX community group were lost. The relevant details are still unclear. In addition, its team has successfully locked the wallet to ensure the safety of funds. Since the official disconnected the database from the network, the user login problem still exists. Everything will be checked in the background and the specific information will be announced later.

data.title: A whale address that once made a profit of $11.8 million on TRUMP entered TRUMP again, and now has a floating loss of $9 million
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News According to Lookonchain monitoring, a whale address that once made a profit of $11.8 million on TRUMP later spent $33.9 million to buy 766,083 TRUMPs at $44.25. The current position has a loss of $21 million. All profits made on TRUMP were lost, and the floating loss was $9 million.

data.title: Sol Strategies Expands SOL Holdings With Recent Acquisition
data.description:
According to PANews, Canadian publicly traded company Sol Strategies announced the acquisition of an additional 40,300 SOL tokens between January 19 and January 31, 2025. The purchase was made at a total cost of approximately 14,337,332 Canadian dollars (9,935,329 USD), with an average price of 355.77 CAD (246.53 USD) per SOL, inclusive of fees and expenses.

Additionally, the company completed a second phase of a private placement of convertible bonds, raising 2.5 million USD. The proceeds were used to acquire 6,564.47 SOL at an average price of 380.84 CAD (265.65 USD) per token.

As of January 31, 2025, Sol Strategies and its subsidiaries hold approximately 189,968 SOL tokens. The total purchase cost for these holdings is around 48.7 million CAD, with an average acquisition price of 256.21 CAD per SOL, including fees and expenses. Based on the closing price of SOL on January 31, 2025, the value of these holdings is estimated at 63.7 million CAD.

data.title: Bitcoin Falls Below 98000 USDT Amid Daily Decline
data.description: According to Foresight News, Bitcoin has fallen below 98,000 USDT, currently trading at 97,963.36 USDT. This marks a daily decrease of 3.29%.
